mapper.sql: spbd.product_bom_det_id, spbd.product_bom_id, spbd.part_material_id, spbd.sub_material_id, spbd.process_id, spbd.quantity, spbd.base_quantity, spbd.position, spbd.parent_id, spbd.remark, spbd.organization_id, spbd.create_user_id, spbd.create_time, spbd.modified_user_id, spbd.modified_time, spbd.is_delete, spbd.option1, spbd.option2, spbd.option3
mapper.select: select , sm.material_code as part_material_code,sm.material_name,sm.version,sm.material_desc, sml.material_code as sub_material_code, sp.process_name, u.user_name as create_user_name,s.user_name as modified_user_name, bo.organization_name from smt_product_bom_det spbd left join fantech_imes.smt_material sm on spbd.part_material_id=sm.material_id left join fantech_imes.smt_material sml on spbd.sub_material_id=sml.material_id left join fantech_imes.smt_process sp on spbd.process_id=sp.process_id left join ocean.sys_user u on spbd.create_user_id=u.user_id left join ocean.sys_user s on spbd.modified_user_id=s.user_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_organization bo ON spbd.organization_id = bo.organization_id where parent_id is null and product_bom_id = #{productBomId}

select , sm.material_code as part_material_code,sm.material_name,sm.version,sm.material_desc, sml.material_code as sub_material_code, sp.process_name, u.user_name as create_user_name,s.user_name as modified_user_name, bo.organization_name from smt_product_bom_det spbd left join fantech_imes.smt_material sm on spbd.part_material_id=sm.material_id left join fantech_imes.smt_material sml on spbd.sub_material_id=sml.material_id left join fantech_imes.smt_process sp on spbd.process_id=sp.process_id left join ocean.sys_user u on spbd.create_user_id=u.user_id left join ocean.sys_user s on spbd.modified_user_id=s.user_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_organization bo ON spbd.organization_id = bo.organization_id where parent_id = #{productBomDetId}
